name: verbeat
description: VerBeat - A 3D Versioning System for Real-World Dev Flow

scripts.update-version: node -e "const v=require('./src/verbeat.js'); console.log('Updating version to:', v.VERSION); require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify({...require('./package.json'), version: v.VERSION}, null, 2) + '\n');"
